授業目的: The purpose of this class to understand why US economy has grown. Because US economy is still significant in the world economy, it is important for graduate students' future careers to understand the US economy in an advanced level.
到達目標: Students will be able to understand the followings: (1) whether or not federal government has helped economic growth, (2) what aspects of institution have helped economic growth, and (3)what is a role for corporate strategies for US economic success.
授業の概要・背景: Students need to understand the US economy because the economy itself is still large in the world economy and US economic policy is influential to policy makers in the world.
授業方法: The class is opened as face to face format.  The lectures are given in Japanese, but the textbook is written in English.　Students, who cannot come to the classroom due to their health concerns, are allowed to participate in the class through Zoom.

第2回: US Economic History until the End of the 19th Century　(Lecture)
第3回: Great Depression and New Deal Policy   (Lecture)
第5回: Antitrust policy (competition policy, Harvard School v. Chicago School) (Lecture)
第6回: Industrial Policy Debate and Corporate Governance (Lecture)
第11回:
Government Expenditures and Texation (Student Presentation)
Chapter 10 (4 hours)
第14回: Oral presentation of your research paper.
トピック.授業外学習2: In the first 7 lectures, each student should read the assigned chapter.  In the last 5 lectures, each student should prepare his/her own presentation based on the content of the assigned chapter.　Other students also should read these chapters to prepare for the class discussion. In the final lecture, each student should submit his/her research paper and presentation based on the paper.
